title: 3 Easy Ways to Remove Someone From Best Friends on Snapchat

steps.title: Open the Snapchat app.
steps.content: Open the Snapchat app. This the icon of the white ghost with a yellow background. [1] X Research source Snapchat is available for iOS in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store . If you aren't already logged in, tap Sign in to do so now, or create an account .

steps.title: Tap the Chat icon.
steps.content: Tap the Chat icon. This is the text box icon on the bottom toolbar, to the left of the camera. [2] X Research source You'll see a list of all your recently messaged friends.

steps.title: Tap and hold on a friend's name.
steps.content: Tap and hold on a friend's name. A pop-up menu will open. [3] X Research source You can also reach this menu by tapping a friend's profile icon, then tapping the three dots icon in the top-right corner.

steps.title: Tap Manage Friendship.
steps.content: Tap Manage Friendship . You'll be able to Report , Block , Remove Friend , or Edit Name . [4] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Remove Friend.
steps.content: Tap Remove Friend . Your friend will be removed. [5] X Research source You'll no longer be able to send Snaps to this user or see their Stories.

steps.title: Understand Snapchat's algorithm.
steps.content: Understand Snapchat's algorithm. To replace a Best Friend, you'll need to become Best Friends with someone else. With Snapchat's algorithm, your top eight Best Friends are determined by the amount of interaction you give to and receive from certain users. [6] X Research source If you already have eight Best Friends , you'll need to limit your interaction with the Best Friend you want to remove. Eventually, Snapchat's algorithm will replace the Best Friend with another user as long as you send and receive enough Snaps to put someone else in the lead. If you don't have eight existing Best Friends, this may take some time for the algorithm to recognize the status changes.

steps.title: Add a new friend.
steps.content: Add a new friend. You can also have an existing friend replace the Best Friend. With more friends to Snap, you'll be more likely to replace a Best Friend.

steps.title: Send multiple Snaps to another friend.
steps.content: Send multiple Snaps to another friend. Focusing your activity with another user will ensure Best Friend status is achieved with them more quickly. Be sure the other person sends around the same number of Snaps to you in return. Avoid sending Snaps to the Best Friend you want to remove. This will make it harder to remove the status.

steps.title: Mute notifications for the replaced Best Friend.
steps.content: Mute notifications for the replaced Best Friend. You'll be able to minimize interaction by muting the user's notifications. [7] X Research source Tap the Chat icon. Press and hold the user's name to open a pop-up menu. Tap Chat Settings , then toggle off Game And Mini Notifications . Best Friends are updated often, but you may need to wait some time for Snapchat to recognize the new status.

steps.content: Open the Snapchat app. This the icon of the white ghost with a yellow background. [8] X Research source If you aren't already logged in, tap Sign in to do so now, or create an account. This method involves changing the default Best Friend emojis to another emoji. You won't be able to hide the Best Friends status on the Send To screen, but it will be masked in your Chat screen.

steps.title: Tap the Chat icon.
steps.content: Tap the Chat icon. This is the text box icon on the bottom toolbar, to the left of the camera.

steps.title: Tap ••• in the top-right corner.
steps.content: Tap ••• in the top-right corner. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Tap Customize Best Friend Emojis.
steps.content: Tap Customize Best Friend Emojis . A list will open with the default emojis and the description for each. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the emoji you want to change.
steps.content: Tap the emoji you want to change. If you want to change the Super BFF emoji, tap Super BFF . [10] X Research source

steps.title: Select the replacement emoji.
steps.content: Select the replacement emoji. You'll be able to use the emojis available on your device. [11] X Research source If you're using iPhone, you can update your emojis by updating your iOS . If you want your Best Friends to be discreet, use an unassuming emoji such as a colored square, circle, or symbol.

steps.title: Tap <.
steps.content: Tap < . This will apply and save your Best Friend emoji settings. If you want to reset the emojis to Snapchat's default, tap Reset to default on the bottom of the screen, then tap Okay .
